response.overview: Takamizawa Yoshifumi is a pure-hearted young man who continues to study law while playing the piano at a bar in Ginza. On the day of his older brother Toshimitsu's wedding, Yoshifumi returned to his hometown after a long time, only to find out that the woman who would become his sister-in-law, Hiroko, was someone he had secretly loved since childhood.
response.title: Kakute Yume Ari
